text: On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (German:Auf der Reeperbahn nachts um halb eins) may refer to: * "On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight" (song) * On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (1929 film) * On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (1954 film) * On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (1969 film)
title: On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight
